title: Пропавшие. Последняя надежда
overview: The TV series Disappeared: The Last Hope gives a look into everyday job of the search-and-rescue volunteer organization Liza Alert. Volunteers save dozens of people without asking for a compensation. All episodes are an artistic reconstruction of real events that follows the search-and-rescue operation from the first call of a disconsolate relative to the moment when the missing person is found.
